channel.title: notJustDPD on LRG
channel.description: Recent content in notJustDPD on LRG

item.title: Tweet
item.description: Why is it so f’ing hard for almost every courier company to deliver to my address? Just had the depot at DPD tell me the exact GPS that their driver had been to… yet the driver didn’t seem to know he was at the wrong address! This happens every. single. time. #notJustDPD ‚ù§Ô∏è 0 | üîÉ 0
